extendedInfo.description: It bores you, just to drink alcohol?Then, "Who is Drunk?" just right for you!List your friends, enter all your drinks (with alcohol) and the game begins.After you draw a card, follow the task. Anyone successfully done this (drinking and do the special task;)), get a lot of points, or get some removed.Any time you can watch your score. If the alcohol at the end  (is tracked by the app with), the end result appears and you know, who is the winner :)If you can then stand still, is another question;)---You have ideas or requests, such as the drinking game "Who is Drunk?" can be expanded? You can find bugs (oh yes, the tests were hard and in the end we had forgotten every bug, because we drink so much alcohol ;) )?Then please use internal feedback feature or write an email to apps@androidcrowd.de---Tags: rich in alcohol, party game, party, fun, drinking till you drop, binge drinking

reviews.title: Crashes more options needed
reviews.comment: My cards crash and I have to press back button also allow to add own rules or dares whatever you call them otherwise could be quite gd fun
reviews.author: Duncan Boswell

reviews.comment: Nice idea, needs a few more cards
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The only card that comes up is \'drink everything\' ..Not very fun.
reviews.author: A Google User
